name: Excursus
description:
Excursus is an action packed player verse player fighting, shoot em’ up experience. With easy and innovative controls players battle it out with two alien warriors in a blood match for the control of Earth 

after their final Excursus. Players must avoid environmental hazards such as electrical pylons and lightning, while trying to reduce each other’s lives to 0, and gathering pickups to help them survive the match. Can you defeat your friends for total world domination?

Key Features:
2 levels to choose from, each with unique layouts and designs!
Projectile and melee combat!
Environmental Hazards!
Original Soundtrack and radical sounds!
Easy Controls!
